How to be ready for donation day?
1- Sleeping 6-8 hours at least on the day befor the donation. 2- Drink plenty of fluids 3- Eating Healthy snacks (fat free) in the day of donation 4- You must be in good health , and in case of taking drugs that can affect the donation process please consult the doctor 5- For women: Not to be pregnant or during the menstrual cycle, it should be at least 6 weeks after giving birth 6- Consult the doctor if you have any chronic illness or if you had an surgery that might affect your health or affect the blood. 7- You must wait at least three days after any procedure with your teeth before donating 8- Please inform your doctor if you had any blood transfusion in the past 9- Please bring your original Civil Id to be valid in the blood donation day
